abstract: Index model and related search algorithms developed upon it are the fundamental issues of information retrieval, data mining and knowledge discovery. Upon doubled-sorted inter-relevant successive tree, a newly full-text index model, this paper develops a search algorithm, which remarkably improves the full-text search efficiency, and demonstrates the advantages of inter-relevant successive trees in index domain.
meta: Conference: Fuzzy Systems and Knowledge Discovery, 2008. FSKD '08. Fifth International Conference onVolume: 5
